"What is (are) 2,4-Dienoyl-CoA reductase deficiency ?","2,4-Dienoyl-CoA reductase deficiency is associated with hypotonia and respiratory acidosis in infancy. This condition may be associated with the DECR1 gene and likely has an autosomal recessive pattern of inheritance.",GARD,"2,4-Dienoyl-CoA reductase deficiency"
